text: Miuccia Prada (born Maria Bianchi; 10 May 1949) is an Italian fashion designer. She designs for Prada. In 1992 she started a second fashion label, Miu Miu. Prada is the youngest granddaughter of Mario Prada. She was born in Milan. ==Personal life== She met Patrizio Bertelli in 1977, and married him a year later. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Artists from Milan Category:Italian fashion designers
title: Miuccia Prada
